descriptions: No evidence is identified from the text.

Strong evidence is identified, clearly supporting the analysis, reflection, or research with minor gaps.
Evidence is comprehensively and effectively used to support insightful analysis, reflection, and research.
No analysis or reflection is present.
Analysis and reflection are superficial or missing key elements.
Basic analysis and reflection are present but lack depth and insight.
Competent analysis and reflection demonstrate a good understanding of the text.
Thoughtful analysis and reflection show a clear understanding and offer some insight.
Insightful and nuanced analysis and reflection demonstrate a deep understanding of the text.

Limited application of 7th grade reading standards is demonstrated.
Application of 7th grade reading standards is evident and supports the analysis.
Effective application of 7th grade reading standards enhances the depth of analysis.
Sophisticated application of 7th grade reading standards provides nuanced insights.
Response is unclear and disorganized.
Response is difficult to follow with significant issues in clarity and organization.
Response is somewhat clear but lacks logical organization.
Response is generally clear and organized logically.
Response is clear, well-organized, and easy to follow.
Response is exceptionally clear, coherent, and logically structured, enhancing understanding.
